lemma valid_node_Main_CondFalse: assumes "CFG.valid_node sourcenode targetnode (valid_edge wfp) (Main,n)" and "n \<noteq> Entry" and "Rep_wf_prog wfp = (prog,procs)" and "Rep_wf_prog wfp' = (if (b) c\<^sub>1 else prog,procs)" shows "CFG.valid_node sourcenode targetnode (valid_edge wfp') (Main, n \<oplus> (#:c\<^sub>1 + 1))"
